Title: The Hinge
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), Julieanne Smolinski
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: Frankie tries to reconnect with her estranged sister. Grace wants to fix a broken window in the house. Robert invites Sol to a folk music cruise. Bud wants Coyote and Allison to be friends.
